charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw distant figures
in the moonlight.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1101_020:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] got closer, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Silver, Sneasel,
and Ethan.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_040: Tch... Now we’ve got a crowd.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_050:
I was just thanking Silver for battling with us
against Team Rocket.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_060: It was really great to have Silver on our side!
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_0301_070:
Are you talking about the battle
on Pasio?
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_0401_080:
Yeah... To take on Team Rocket, I had
no choice but to team up with Ethan.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_0402_100: Don’t go treating us like we’re friends.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_0402_110:
I may have battled on their side, but it just kinda
happened, OK?
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_120: I despise Team Rocket and Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_130:
I’d much rather team up with Ethan than have to
watch those Team Rocket jerks walk around all
high-and-mighty.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_140: Even so, I’m happy you lent us a hand, Silver.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_150: If you hadn’t, Pasio would’ve been in rough shape.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_170:
Team Rocket did a lot of bad things in the
Johto region.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_180:
Like stealing people’s Pokémon. Why would anyone
ever do something so terrible?
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_230:
My first encounters with Pokémon weren’t
exactly praiseworthy.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_0401_250:
I’m in no position to criticize Team Rocket for the
bad things they’ve done.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_0402_270:
I’ve also done terrible things to people
and Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_290:
What I’m saying is... I’m not exactly the kind of
Trainer that Sneasel can be proud of.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_310: I don’t expect to be forgiven.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_320:
But for now, at least, I want to become a Trainer
worthy of Sneasel.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_340: If you think I’m unworthy, you’re free to leave.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_0302_370:
It looks like you have a
good relationship.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_400:
At the very least, I think Sneasel approves of you
as a partner.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_410: You’re both saying the same thing...
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_440: I WILL become the strongest in the world.
charaepi_ch0133_10_shilver/2301_1201_450:
I’ll do it so you—and everyone else—can be
proud of me, Sneasel.
